Fishing Tackle – Sold by anglers for anglers Looking for fishing tackle? Look no further, it’s all here. Gerry’s Fishing has been an independent, family run fishing tackle store for over 40 years. We have come from a tiny traditional fishing shop into one of the largest stores in the country. Our Website contains around 30,000 individual products to pick from, yes 30,000 catering for all styles of fishing including carp fishing sea fishing Our fishing tackle store beach rods Facebook Youtube Instagram Information About Us Contact Us Size Guide History Of Gerry's Finance Available Wishlist Useful Fishing Tips (Blog) Support Returns Form Shipping Details Terms & Conditions My Account FAQ'S Subscribe Newsletter Signup our newsletter to get update information, news & insight Email Sign Up We use cookies to ensure that we give you the best experience on our website. If you continue to use this site we will assume that you are happy with it. Ok Privacy policy
